- The surrounding squares are as follows:

  - (5, 8) -> '.' (floor)

Since the avatar can look to the left and right without any immediate hazards, the best action to consider would be to move the avatar to the left (5, 6) to access the crate. Crates may be useful in navigating around obstacles or potentially obtaining items.

I'll choose the action to move left.

``` Action: 1 ``` 

Moving left to the crate could provide additional resources or options for movement. I expect this to help in progressing towards resource collection or clearing paths.
